subject: Very Urgent!
body:
Very Urgent!
This is to inform you about your abandoned consignment box held at our
storage vault.
My Name is Mr. Andrew J. Savage, III, Senior Storage officer at
Charleston International Airport (CHS) SC USA. During our recent
withheld package routine check at the Airport Storage Vault, we
discovered an abandoned shipment from one Diplomat agent, under
shipping forwarder from Hatfield-Jackson Atlanta Intl Airport to our
facility custody here in Charleston International Airport SC and when
scanned, it revealed an undisclosed sum of money in one Metal Trunk
Box.
The consignment was abandoned because the Contents of the consignment
was not properly declared by the consignee as MONEY rather it was
declared as personal effect to avoid diversion by the shipping agent
or inability of the diplomat to pay for United States Inspection
charges which Cost $105 Dollar only NO ADDITIONAL CHARGES.
The details on the consignment including your email which were tagged
on the consignment box, Please note that this consignment supposed to
have return to the United States Treasury Account as an unclaimed fund
due to your delays in contacting us and to pay for United States
Inspection charges Cost $105.
To verify you as the exact owner of the consignment box kindly provide
you full details below
1] Your Full Name::::::
2] Country / City ::::::::
3] Occupation :::::::::
4] Valid Phone Number:::::
5] 
Any valid Governmental identification Card [ I.D Card]
For this reason, i will urgently advise you to contact me at my
private email address [ 
andrewjsavages00@gmail.com
 ] for further
instruction on how to claim your consignment which await delivery at
Charleston International Airport SC.
Warmest Regards,
Mr. Andrew J. Savage, III,
the Senior Storage officer at Charleston International Airport SC.

subject: Re: Very Urgent!
body:
Dear Mr. Andrew J. Savage, III,

I am surprised to hear about this abandoned box at your storage vault. I don't recall sending or expecting any shipment, especially one containing a large sum of money.

However, if you believe that I am the rightful owner of this box, I would like to cooperate fully in order to clear up this matter. Here are my details:

Full Name: John Doe
Country City: London, United Kingdom
Occupation: Software Engineer
Valid Phone Number: +44 20 1234 5678

Please note that for security reasons, I cannot provide my card details via email. 

I look forward to hearing from you soon with further instructions on how to claim this box.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Very Urgent!
body:
Your details are well recorded.
Below is our shipping service and their prices
1) FedEx Express delivery: 24hrs =$1340
2) DHL Express delivery: 24hrs =$1390
3) Faster link Express delivery: 48hrs =1290
4) UPS Express delivery: 48hrs = $1370
5) Global Express delivery: 24hrs =$2150

Kindly choose above your preferred option for your delivery and get back to me for further shipping procedures.

Regards
Andrew j

[Andrew J. Savage Savage - Chat @ Spike](https://spikenow.com/r/a/?ref=spike-organic-signature&_ts=2g74yy)	[2g74yy]

subject: Re: Very Urgent!
body:
I'm still waiting on your respond regarding the shipment of your consignment box,

[Andrew J. Savage Savage - Chat @ Spike](https://spikenow.com/r/a/?ref=spike-organic-signature&_ts=2g9w17)	[2g9w17]

subject: Re: Very Urgent!
body:
Dear Andrew J. Savage,

I apologize for the delay in my response. Could you please provide more details about the box you mentioned? I would like to know its contents, origin, and the necessary steps I need to take for its shipment.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Very Urgent!
body:
Dear David

This consignment box was abandoned at airport storage which need to be delivered to your doorstep

Note: The content of the consignment box is 10.5 million US dollars only
Kindly choose your prefer option for delivering.

Andrew j

[Andrew J. Savage Savage - Chat @ Spike](https://spikenow.com/r/a/?ref=spike-organic-signature&_ts=2gcvpj)	[2gcvpj]
